name: Alexander Toth
title: Systems · Machine Learning · Full Stack · Audio DSP
summary: Multifaceted developer with a background in music composition.

bullets: Collaborated with musicians to develop programs and tools for live performance with electronics.
Built real-time audio-visual tools in C/C++ and Max.
Authored machine-learning applications and websites with PyTorch, TensorFlow, and LangChain.

experience.role: Adjunct Instructor — Intro to Computer Music
bullets: Designed curriculum, taught Ableton Live and basic DSP to undergraduate and graduate students.

education.school: Indiana University Jacobs School of Music

education.degree: B.M. Vocal Performance with Licensure to Teach
